</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>The name of the MySQL data table,  is the non-system table in all the monitored databases, which can be separated by, to monitor multiple data tables, but the data table needs to be filled in the format of data database name.data table name, when a regular expression needs to be filled in, the format is data database name.data table name.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="datasourceincrementcolumn_yaml">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>the name of the column to be monitored.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="datasourceincrementmode_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#datasourceincrementmode_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">data<wbr>Source<wbr>Increment<wbr>Mode</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>TIMESTAMP indicates that the incremental column is of timestamp type, INCREMENT indicates that the incremental column is of self-incrementing id type.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="datasourcemonitormode_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#datasourcemonitormode_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">data<wbr>Source<wbr>Monitor<wbr>Mode</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>TABLE indicates that the read item is a table, QUERY indicates that the read item is a query.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="datasourcemonitorresource_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#datasourcemonitorresource_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">data<wbr>Source<wbr>Monitor<wbr>Resource</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>When DataMonitorMode=TABLE, pass in the Table that needs to be read; when DataMonitorMode=QUERY, pass in the query sql statement that needs to be read.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="datasourcestartfrom_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#datasourcestartfrom_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">data<wbr>Source<wbr>Start<wbr>From</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">String</span>
    </dt>
    <dd><p>HEAD means copy stock + incremental data, TAIL means copy only incremental data.</p>
</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="datatargetinsertmode_yaml">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#datatargetinsertmode_yaml" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">data<wbr>Target<wbr>Insert<wbr>Mode</a>

        <span class="property-type"><a href="#datahubtasksourceresourcemysqlparamdatatargetrecordmapping">List&lt;Property Map&gt;</a></span>

</dd><dt class="property-optional"

</span>

        <span class="property-type">String</span>

</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="#datahubtasksourceresourcemysqlparamdropcls">Property Map</a></span>

</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="dropinvalidmessage_yaml">

</span>

        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>

        <span id="includecontentchanges_yaml">

</span>

        <span class="property-type">String</span>

        <span id="includequery_yaml">

        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>

        <span class="property-type">Boolean</span>

        <span class="property-type">String</span>

</dd><dt class="property-optional"
